demopage_header_description: Bring your product to the world using our "platform + service" one-stop solution for enterprises and have it internationalized with the aid of our professional multi-language content management and efficient localization process.
demopage_scenario_doc_translation_descri: No more manual formatting of files as they'll be auto-parsed before translation and auto-formatted after; translation memories are saved and reused at sentence level for more precise and consistent translations.
demopage_scenario_online_editor_descript: Provide a convenient and easy-to-use online editor for translators. Users can translate on the editor efficiently, as it provides translation memories, termbases, and machine translation assistance; and accurately, as an online query is available with spelling and consistency auto-verified.
demopage_scenario_string_management_desc: Professional localization management of UI texts and strings of mobile apps, web software, and scenarios such as tools, games, social media and short videos for the simultaneous release of multilingual content globally.
